_header: Listen friends and hold you still
Note:
For a Latin version of this story see Joh. Bramis Historia Regis Waldei, ed. Imelmann (1912)
XImelmann, Rudolf Hans Robert. Johannis Bramis’ Historia Regis Waldei.
Bonner Studien zur Englischen Philologie 4. Bonn: Hanstein, 1912, 41-4; cf. Child (1882)
XChild, Francis James. The English and Scottish Popular Ballads. 5 vols. in 10 parts. Boston and New York: Houghton, Mifflin, 1882-98, 5.104-5.
_description: ‘Wyfe lapped in a Morrelles Skin’ — in 8-line stanzas
